Scientists
To offer assistance to scientists
To get the railway embankment
To meet with escort
Cross the railway embankment

Before delving into the Zone, crossing the old railway embankment. The only safe passage into it is guarded by the military. However, there is a small tunnel to the left, newcomers usually go through it. There you will have to wait for one of my debtors.
